评论详情: Absolutely beautiful dress. But is very true to size. I ordered too small so I returned and purchased the correct size for me. Quality and appearance is as is in the picture. I cant wait to get the one that fits me.

评论概述: Weird fit, but pretty from the back.
评论详情: I know $100 isn’t considered a lot for a wedding dress, but I still expected more for the price.  The open back is very pretty and it also has a nice train, but the lace has a shiny look“eyelash” lace around the neckline, back, and sleeves.

I know it is not very common to order a wedding dress online without trying it on first but I did and I was soo impressed! I did get mine altered to my measurements, which if I went back, I would not do again. I would order my usual size and get it altered once I got it. Otherwise, it was beautiful and very well made!

I was very nervous about ordering a wedding dress online. It fit perfectly. Wedding dresses run a little long but in heels it's ok without needing hemming. The mesh is flesh toned. Exactly as pictured. I was nervous because other dresses in review pics came with white mesh. This is very well sewn and fits exactly as sized. Some said to go down a size but the measurements were spot on. Totally recommend. I'll update with a pic in October on our big day! ❤️

评论概述: Fit well but not the style shown
评论详情: The dress fit well, although the lace is a bit itchy. I ordered the style with a button-up, see-through back but was sent one with a corset back.
Beautiful fabric. Nice material. Soft. Not wrinkled. Size 16. Too big for me on the top.

The dress is beautiful and its exactly like the picture, the quality of the fabric is great , Shipment was lost somewhere in logistics at some time and the suppliers informed me right away and they took action on the spot and made me another one custom made in a short period and it didn’t affect the quality of the product! Thank you so much for your reliability and great service .
Me encanta! Por las medidas me quedo perfecto solo las mangas quedan muy grandes, opte por ponerlas hacia arriba. Pero me gusta.
I love it so much, I added an overskirt and of shoulders sleeves it looks amazing

This dress was absolutely stunning, especially the back and train. The quality was also amazing and you would never know that I came from Amazon. Unfortunately, I did return bc I just wasn’t in love with it, specifically how it looked on me from the front. I’m very tall so it did end up being too short on me. I ordered a size 10. My size reference: 5’11” tall, 155lbs, 36C bra, 29” waist, 38” hips.

评论概述: Beautiful but too small for me
评论详情: Beautiful but too small. Would but two size up from my original size

It looks almost exactly as the picture but the sleeves are too big but may be able to see them, it also came with two stains , blue ink and small black. I’m going to get married at the beach so hopefully that will camouflage it and take away the

Honestly I am taken back at the quality for this price point! For reference I am 5'6 and weigh 130. Little big around the bust but that can be easily fixed. The back of the dress is a little different than what is pictured but again that can be fixed with alterations. I will add pictures soon. Took little less than a month to be delivered.

评论概述: Custom measurements were perfect but sleeves not like pictured
评论详情: Sleeves were more like tutu material not pantyhose material which is what the image looks like. Other than that it was everything expected perfect for the price and custom measurements were great.

I didn't want to splurge on my small church wedding, as we already had a civil marriage last year. This dress is amazing. Customer service was super professional and fast. They asked my measurements, and the dressed fits perfectly. The only negative comment I have is that, as the fabric isn't top quality it might feel a bit hot. Overall I will say it's great value for the money.
The measurements were right but didn't fit as expected. The dress is beautiful

评论概述: They are willing to work with you to customize your dreamed dress
评论详情: I loved it it is exactly what’s described in the picture and the best thing you can costumize it to fit perfectly on you I really love it

Had a very strict budget for my wedding, and this dress hit the spot! A lot of the dresses I had tried just felt and looked cheap and didn’t feel like the dress I wanted for my wedding day, but I also didn’t want to spend thousands on a dress for just one day. I found this one and I was so happy with it! It did require a few alterations as should be expected- I had it taken in just a little, and a bustle added. I did have elastic added to the straps because they were a bit harsh on my shoulders. My seamstress also said she was impressed with the quality of the dress as well. Would definitely recommend!
Quede guapísima en mi boda, me lucí al máximo, vestido espectacular

So my husband and I got married during quarantine last year and this year my parents decided to throw us a big wedding. I obviously was not wanting to spend thousands of dollars on a wedding dress BUT let me tell you ladies this dress is amazing! The dress looks as if it’s worth a thousand dollars. It has the perfect amount of puff and the rhinestones on the front on the chest area are stunning. The dress did fit a little bigger than I anticipated but the company was very helpful with options. I ended up getting the dress altered and it fits great! You will not regret buying this dress!

评论概述: I just loved it. Great quality!
Los servicios de ese vendedor muy malos
评论详情: Hermoso un poco apretado, intente devolverlo para pedir una talla más grande , pero tenía que pagar 60 dólar de envío, los servicios de ese vendedor muy malo

I was skeptical when purchasing a gown off of Amazon, but was pleasantly surprised! Asked for extra length to be added, and it was done with no hassle. Minor alterations were all I needed, and got so many compliments on the dress! I thought it was incredibly flattering. Normally wear a size 16 in dresses. -Erica

评论概述: Hip and thigh measurements needed for customization of mermaid style
评论详情: Beautiful dress. I was unsure about buying wedding dress online. Glad I did! Went to bridal shop tried on styles to see what looked good then found similar online. I sent in measurements and they customized perfectly. They should require thigh measurements because my thigh are slightly larger than my hips which makes sitting and walking not easy in mermaid style. But no worries enough fabric to have seams let out. Wish packaging a little stronger. Shipping cut through both bags with a razor in several places, so glad they turned dress instead out. Recommend a sturdier packaging. No damage to the dress. Thank God. (Yes, it's a miracle USPS did not cut my dress). Dress fabric nice. Glad I ordered online!
Fit perfectly! My groom loved it!

The dress we received was well made; a great deal for the price.  We weren't sure if the belt was going to be included and had planned on trying to make our own but it was included.  There were minor details that differed from the picture but overall this was a very nice dress.

Llego bien, en tiempo y forma, esperaba que el color fuera un poquito más beige, es blanco pero esta lindo el color, no es blanco azulado, la talla correcta, los botones muy lindos, tal cual la foto.  La tela esperaba que fuera mate, es un poco brillosa pero no se ve de mala calidad, el vestido es tan lindo que el brillo fue lo de menos.  Recomendado.
Bought for my wedding ordered a size 10 knowing id have to take it in and i love it so much!!
I guess Amazon has pretty much true to size dresses.  Because I got  size bigger. And I regret that because now it’s to big. I needed a size smaller.

If you're on a budget man oh man get this dress seriously. I have to get a few alterations but I knew that would happen and since it's for my wedding I want it to fit perfect, but the sizing was pretty darn close. Also keep in mind most people get there wedding dress altered anyways so this was a non issue but I suggest to others to be prepaired The package came early which was awesome Also their communication is awesome, and they to really want to help you. This dress looks at least $4000, I've been to multiple shops and im still in shock I only paid $160. I will definitely post pictures of it after wedding and it's been altered

I decided to take a risk and buy a dress online. I figured for the price, it wouldn't be a huge loss if it didn't work out. This seller offered custom made dresses at no extra cost so I selected the dress size closest to my measurements and contacted the seller directly with all my specific measurements. They got back to me right away to reconfirm my measurements and then I waited. The dress arrived sooner than it said it was going to be delivered, by couple weeks. It came folded up in a small package so I was shocked by how lightweight this dress was and completely stunned by how gorgeous it was once I unraveled it from the package!!! It fits beautifully!!!!! It looks slight different from what is shown online regarding the lace detailing and layers/thickness of the train but I still love this dress. It is so flattering to my body and very slimming as well. I made some minor adjustments in the back to show the shape of my bum a little more, and shortened the straps a tiny bit because I gave the wrong measurements but other than that, it was perfect!! It was made so that I could wear a 2" heel with it and the dress would just be long enough to grace the floor, and it has a built in bra! For the value, this was beautifully made and because it was so lightweight, it made it much easier to pack in my suit case to take to Hawaii without taking up much room or added weight! Thank you, thank you, thank you!
Very well made dress
